American Studies at the Univ. of Virginia : A Day in Radio (September 21, 1939)

infos.info: Originally called ';The Rise of the Goldbergs.'; First appearance on the Blue network on November 20, 1929. From 1938-1945 CBS show aired it at various times. Also heard on WOR (ca. 1938-1940) weekdays at 8:45 a.m., and briefly on NBC beginning June 1941.

synopses.synopsis: Gertrude Berg created an image of herself on paper, then found it nationally accepted as a true reflection of an entire ethnic group. Her Molly Goldberg possessed to millions the breath of the Jewish ghetto. - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
